Automatic.Description: The fire selector is stuck on a non-existent setting
Automatic.Explanation: Weapon variant with only a full-auto fire mode, featuring an increased fire rate but reduced ergonomics

Marksman.Description: To combat the high prices of ammunition, this weapon has been modified to remove its full-auto fire mode. As a result, it now excels in medium-distance engagements
Marksman.Explanation: Weapon variant with the fire mode changed to Single/Burst, featuring reduced recoil and no weapon malfunctions

Handy.Description: Due to changes in how you can hold the weapon, using it is now as natural as walking
Handy.Explanation: Weapon variant with significantly enhanced ergonomics, allowing for improved handling, faster aim transitions, and reduced fatigue during prolonged use

Unbreakable.Description: Some famous guy from television used his advertised product to make this gun unbreakable. Now you can throw thus gun into the sand without worring that it will jam afterwards. ~It even works underwater!~ Just maybe don't cut it in half...
Unbreakable.Explanation: Weapon variant without durability damage, overheating and unable to malfunction

Karabin Spetsialniy.Description: KS-23 "Special Carbine" is a shotgun designated by the Russian military as a carbine. So we made more of them
Karabin Spetsialniy.Explanation: Shotgun variant chambered in 23x75mmR featured a special 12-round magazine and without interclip reload for more carbine action!

Assault Rifle.Description: "I want to have a refund, this weapon is too large for me! B-but I like the caliber. Can you get me something smaller that can fit in my handbag?"
Assault Rifle.Explanation: Pistols chambered in 5.56x45mm NATO caliber and fitting all M4A1 magazines

Endless.Description:
Do you even need 250 or even 400 ammo in one raid?
I don't think so, but this weapon think differently so here we are
Endless.Explanation: Weapon variant with magazine that is heavy and bulky, but very spacious
